extendedInfo.description: As transportation professionals, you need to find and move freight to sustain your business; that's where Getloaded for Android comes in.  This app brings all the essential core features available at Getloaded, plus more, right to your fingertips.  Getloaded for Android lets you find and move freight with just a touch.It's reliable.  It's simple.  It's fast.  It's easy.- GPS based for easy load and truck searching.- Call the contact directly from the app.- Easily find a "back-haul" from your current location.- Quickly browse all available loads and trucks with just a simple touch.This app combines the usability and speed of Getloaded's freight matching service with the technology of the Android platform to bring the biggest load board right to your fingertips.With Getloaded for Android you can see all of the saved searches you have on Getloaded. Plus, the app will save every search you conduct when using it, saving you some much needed time!Get all of the great features you have come to rely on at Getloaded, like Rate Index, TransCredit credit scores and PC*MILER mileage while you are on the go.  No more deadheading or having your freight sit idle.  Getloaded for Android gives you the technology to always keep your trucks loaded and your freight moving.

reviews.title: Five star app
reviews.comment: Love this very helpful app wish it had the browser option like on the iPhone app but still 5 star app
reviews.author: oscar batts

reviews.title: Best freightmatching app!
reviews.comment: Great app from Getloaded! Super easy to use and great interface. Thx GL!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A great app
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for.  I can search and post from my phone. And easy to use.
